title: The To Do List: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Dan Kois discuss The To Do List. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
